Description:
1.7HA 4.25 Acres Perfectly Positioned For Growth
Well situated 2000 metres South of the historic township of Talbot this 4.25 acre allotment is zoned Rural Living and offers pleasant blend of native pastures, established timber and elevated areas that would make an ideal home-sites (STCA). Recently surveyed and with the convenience private entrance, phone passing and mains power nearby (but not passing) this property offers potential for a dwelling or given its proximity major centres such Ballarat & Maryborough and thriving goldfields townships of Clunes and Talbot, an astute "land-bank" investment.

Description:
Ideal First Home, Investment or Development Opportunity
There are many options for this home, new to the market place. The first home buyer will struggle to find anything in town at the price, an investor will appreciate the current $230 per week return and the developer (STCA) will be delighted with the potential. Occupiers enjoy two spacious bedrooms and a larger office which could be an alternate third bedroom. There is also a bungalow at the rear perfect for a rumpus or studio or gym. Its locale has you just 1 minute to the train station and similar to the hub of this historic township for a great coffee and cake.

Description:
MODERN SOPHISTICATION ON IMPRESSIVE SEMI-RURAL ALLOTMENT
Beautifully sited on a massive 4619m2 (approx.) allotment, surrounded by gums this property is the ultimate opportunity to secure a semi-rural property with the privilege of being just moments from Creswick township, 30 minutes to Daylesford and 15 minutes to the city of Ballarat.
The moment you enter the front door you will appreciate the quality and detail of this newly constructed 26 square (35.5 squares under-roof) home. Beyond an impressive facade, you will find an extraordinary family residence which offers contemporary style, space and comfortability.
Walking through the impressive open entry, you will be greeted by beautifully polished bamboo floorboards (which feature throughout the entire home). The oversized master bedroom is separate from the rest of the home and features a large ensuite with double vanity and huge walk in robe, while the remainder 3 bedrooms are all double sized, including built in robes and are serviced by a striking bathroom, separate toilet and independent laundry with an abundance of storage.
Further into the heart of the home, you will be excited by the balance of warm sophistication achieved within the vast open plan space that is flooded with natural light and is complemented with 5.7 star rated gas log fire beautifully placed by the dining area and kitchen and zoned ducted cooling, heating with the efficiency of 5kW of solar energy fed back into the grid at 6.5 cents.
The impressive oversized kitchen is complete with a stainless steel 900mm oven and 5 burner gas stove, Caesar stone bench tops, dishwasher and a prodigious butler's pantry which offers more space for cooking and storage.
The commodious allotment offers a myriad of opportunity depending on your lifestyle choices, with two under roof alfresco completes the copious entertaining spaces, which defines this home as a perfect plan for growing families or those wishing to step up the level of accommodation. A freestanding 9 x 6m triple bay shed with 3 phase power also provides extra room for those additional vehicles, while a 6 x 3m garden shed keeps the garden equipment separate and easily accessible.
Further lifestyle features of this impressive home include NBN connection, double glazing, quality drapes and light fittings throughout, bamboo floor coverings and upmarket fittings and fixtures, quality wool carpet in the living and bedrooms, 5 kilowatt solar system, 6 star energy rating, spacious 2550mm ceiling height and direct access from garage into the kitchen.
It's easy to picture yourself enjoying the privacy and magnitude of space on offer, along with the convenience of the Creswick township and only 15 minutes to the city of Ballarat. Homes of this calibre and uniqueness simply don't come onto the market so enquire today to arrange your own inspection.

Description:
Kick back and relax- quiet location
Quiet township living in a delightful country setting. Only 10yo app, and with many extras included, this superb 2 bedroom home features a lovely timber decked leaf-entwined north-facing alfresco area, a spacious living zone, galley style kitchen with large pantry space and excellent quality fittings and fixtures throughout. Sliding door robes to both bedrooms, large shower recess, gas heating, air conditioning, sunblinds, central vacuum, filtered water etc etc. Perfect for retirement or small family, with single carport, double garage, and an easy-care 381sqm block only minutes to Creswick's town centre. Kick back and relax in this wonderful low maintenance package for many years to come.

Description:
Gorgeous 12 Acre Farmlet
Located in the sought after horse area near the Ballarat Racecourse and Miners Rest Equine Clinic, is this private 12 acre allotment set up for horses, but could easily house any livestock you prefer. The tidy home has feature mud brick walls at either end, completed by Western Red Cedar, while inside the timber flooring throughout makes for an easy clean. Space won't be an issue as all areas are incredibly roomy, the kitchen offers a choice of gas or combustion cooking as well as a dishwasher with timber benchtops while the entire living area is heated by a cosy wood heater. The master suite has a good sized robe, as well as a fully appointed ensuite complete with a corner spa and dual glass basins set on a polished timber benchtop. Each of the other two bedrooms are 3.8 x 3.8m offering plenty of space for the children or a home office. Moving outside, there is a large carport attached to the home for vehicle coverage, garden shedding and a raised north facing deck for enjoying the sunshine while entertaining. A South facing paved area off the dining room will give a second option for enjoying the great outdoors with a private bush view. The main paddock has been sown to horse pasture, and has two post and rail yards as well as a tie up area. Fruit trees and a vegetable garden complete this wonderful property. Bordered by Government land leaving you with only one neighbour and Zoned Rural Living, there may be the opportunity to subdivide STCA, with the knowledge you won't be built out. Call our agent today for an inspection.

Description:
COUNTRY ESCAPE WITH GRANDSTAND VIEWS
Situated in an elevated, private position is this architecturally designed double brick home. Located on 26 Acres (approx.) This property offers a perfect relaxed rural living environment with 1km of creek frontage (approx.) and sweeping views of surrounding countryside. Substantial living area with high ceilings, cozy wood heating, and amazing views over part of the property. Gorgeous kitchen with near new appliances, electric cooking, breakfast bar, dishwasher and an abundance of cupboard space. Substantial master bedroom with recently renovated ensuite, WIR and sliding door to front veranda with also beautiful views. The other bedrooms are also generous with large BIRs and are serviced by the recently renovated family bathroom with shower, vanity and toilet. The front and back verandas are perfect for all seasons to sit back and relax. Outside be self-sufficient with a fruit trees, 1 dam, 1/2 title rights to creek at lower side of the property, 5 water tanks, pumps, solar power plus mains power. This property is divided into 6 well fenced paddocks and has substantial colour bond fencing around the home. This property has terrific grazing for some horses, sheep or cattle. Fabulous undercover entertaining area with plenty of room for family get-togethers. An abundance of shedding with a four car powered lock-up garage, concreted with air-conditioning and pot belly stove (the perfect man cave!) There is a further powered two car lock-up garage and also has a sheep shearing area, with 2 pens and a race. As an added bonus for the dog enthusiasts is a terrific set up with six large sheltered and concreted dog runs, serviced by rainwater, perfect for breeders and greyhounds. Don't delay and arrange an inspection today.
Contact Alisa Johnson at our Maryborough Office on 0409 935 766

Description:
Perfect location and views of the rolling hills!
Situated in beautiful Kingston this fully renovated property set on approximately half an acre with panoramic views, comprises 2 spacious bedrooms, large designer bathroom, an open plan livingroom/kitchen, with separate dining area, good sized laundry, and a separate toilet.
Outside there is shedding (3.5x6.0) and enough space to let the kids be free and to make a perfect garden.
Only minutes to Creswick and under fifteen minutes to Daylesford the dwelling could be a fantastic weekender.
Inspection by appointment only.

Description:
Idyllic Location overlooking Golf Course
Imagine coming home to the place other's can only holiday at.... The RACV Goldfields Resort offers a limited number of privately owned blocks within the Resort grounds, lining the fairways of the golf course. This is one of the prime blocks along the first fairway, close enough to walk to the hotel complex for dinner or drinks, but set in a quiet court location.
You will see kangaroos grazing in the evenings and have the opportunity to enjoy the Resort facilities such as the tennis courts, golf course, indoor pool and gym.
The RACV Goldfields Resort is only a few minutes' drive from the heart of Creswick, 12 minutes from Ballarat and everything the city life offers, while being around 25 minutes from Daylesford's spa country.
Creswick offers great public transport, childcare, kinders, primary schools, shopping, hospital and medical facilities, walking and cycling tracks, lakes for swimming and fishing, community centre with many groups and classes available.
Build your dream home today (STCA). Contact our agents!

Address: Lot 1/ Peters Hill Track Lillicur VIC 3371
Description:
GREAT ESCAPE IN STATE FOREST - $100,000
This pastured 15.3186 HA (37.8 acres) is located at Lillicur, which is just west of Talbot. It is a pastured parcel of land with scattered natural gums native to the area. All fenced into one paddock with a small dam which could be enlarged for more permanent use. Surrounded mostly by State Forest and zoned Rural Conservation Zone (RCZ) this is a great getaway block to escape to.
With gravel road access - directions are - turn off the Talbot-Lexton Road into Norburys Road, then turn right after 2 km into Hermit Track and the land is approx 600m on left hand side.

Description:
A Country Escape or Hobby Farm on Approx. 11.5 Rolling Acres
A great opportunity to purchase a quality country home in the peaceful location of Evansford. Set on 11.5 rolling acres (4.6Ha) of grazing land this property is the perfect escape from the rat race. Boasting four bedrooms, 2 open plan living zones, modern kitchen with electric cooking, double sink and dishwasher. Renovated bathroom and separate laundry. The home is kept comfortable all year round by 3 reverse cycle units and wood fire. Outside there is a fabulous spacious outdoor undercover entertaining area, perfect for those Summer BBQ's and taking in the views over the country side and the wildlife including kangaroos and bird life that frequent the property. This area also provides a safe play area for the kids. There is great shedding with power and concrete flooring ideal for the tradesman or tinkerer. Other features of this property include double carport, 2 dams, dog yard, good fencing and over 60,000 litres of tank water. Evansford is 35 mins to Ballarat, 170kms from Melbourne CBD and just a short drive to the historic townships of Talbot and Clunes. This is a great opportunity to retreat to a tranquil country life or use as the perfect weekender. Be quick to book your inspection.

Description:
DAYLESFORD REGION - SEVEN HILLS COUNTRY HOUSE
Just 10 minutes from Daylesford and 20 minutes to Ballarat, Seven Hills Country House is nestled in the historic country township of Kingston. This spacious and beautifully presented double-storey home, ideal for a family home, is sited on a large level block of over three-quarters of an acre and features 4 large bedrooms and flowing living-dining-entertaining areas. Currently operating as self-contained holiday accommodation for up to 11 guests, inspections are by advance appointment only.
* Downstairs: large living room with gas log fire, adjoining study/library. Dining room opens to paved verandah, kitchen-family area with wood heater and panoramic views. The stylish kitchen has granite benchtops, farmhouse sink, wide gas/electric oven. Sparkling bathroom with bath, shower, toilet plus separate powder room. Laundry, direct access to double garage
* Upstairs: 4 beautiful and spacious attic-style bedrooms, large landing area suited to study or reading nook, second bathroom. Reverse cycle heating/cooling
* Polished concrete floors, quality carpets, modern bright decor throughout
* Electricity, rainwater tanks (town water available), wood fire & solar boosted electric hot water service
* School bus nearby

Description:
Superb Setting In Peaceful Valley - The Ideal Tree Change Or Hobby Farm Set On 10 Acres
From the outside, this rammed earth home seems to appear to be grown from the environment while internally the earth and stone walls possess their own distinctive qualities of ambience, warmth, textured finish and timelessness.
The age old principles and the naturally achieving energy efficiency of this home, ensures high thermal mass, enabling the storage of warmth in the winter and the ability to keep the interior cool through the summer.
Constructed with additional building materials (including hardiplank and Stone), this home draped in vines incorporates two bedrooms, a family bathroom, an open plan kitchen and two living zones. Further warmed by a combustion heater and pot belly stove, this home has energy efficiency assistance from 8 solar panels plus mains power, ample tank water with bore as well as a unique upside down creek and provides 10 aces of land which could produce your own vegetables or livestock. (various fruit trees already planted).
Freshly decorated and painted throughout, this property has durable slate floors, timber vaulted ceilings, a good amount of storage through the very functional kitchen and NBN satellite connection. Well suited for a young couple, family or the ultimate country getaway with a double lock up garage plus a handy double carport.
Convenient to the country township of Talbot (approx. 5 minutes away) along with a 10 minute drive to Clunes or a short trip to Maryborough (approx. 15 minutes). Ballarat is within easy commuting distance (approx. 35 minutes away) while Dunach is one the most attractive valleys in the central goldfields with the natural beauty of its immediate surrounds.
Whether you wish to experience a tree change environment or are just looking for the serenity of the land, this 10 acre property will certainly provide you with a home full of originality even its just a weekender. Call our agent for details.

Description:
44 ACRE COUNTRY RETREAT
Boasting 2 road frontages this outstanding acreage is only 8 mins drive to Daylesford and 75 mins to Melbourne. Prime farming zone with mature Blue Gums ready for harvest. About 10 acres is cleared and offers wonderful sites to build your dream home [STCA] .The property is on bitumen roads, with a watercourse running through the land.
Features:-
Prime farming zone with fertile soils
2 road frontages both bitumen
Mature trees ready to harvest
44 acres with 10 acres cleared
Inspection by private appointment

Description:
Brick Home set on Huge Allotment of 3293m2 (Approx)
Located in one of Creswick's best streets is this sound brick home that is set on an enormous allotment of approx. 3293m2 which could be ideal for those looking for room for shedding or subdivision potential (STCA). Being opposite parkland, the setting is simply stunning and only minutes to the town centres amenities. Comprising three good sized bedrooms, spacious lounge room, neat kitchen with gas appliances, gas heating and good sized shedding. This property has been well cared for over the years and is a fantastic opportunity to the next purchaser. Enquire today to arrange your own inspection.

Description:
2023m2 Allotment In Convenient & Historic Talbot
This highly affordable parcel of land is within distance to the historic town centre of Talbot and has immediate access reticulated water and mains power along its frontage. Zoned Rural Living Zone the block is level and has a frontage of 40.24m and a depth of 50.29m and is well fenced on all boundaries and already has the makings as great home site (STCA) with daily Bus and Rail services to Melbourne Ballarat & Maryborough, easy access to Talbots shops, hotel, primary school, sports ground, its widely acclaimed farmers markets. Call today to nest or invest in this picturesque and convenient location - 48km North West of 16km South of Maryborough and within a two hour drive of Melbourne.

Description:
Picture Perfect Cottage on Almost 3 Acres
This charming 3 bedroom cottage has been lovingly restored with nothing to do except move in. Set on approximately 2.9 acres (1.166Ha) of manicured lawns and an immaculate English cottage garden which will surprise you daily in spring, the home welcomes you through a glorious lead light door, into a wide hallway with glowing timber floors leading you down to the light and bright living area heated by a combustion wood heater and convenient split system. The country style kitchen has stylish timber benches with electric cooking, large serving bench & formal dining area, while two of the three bedrooms have warm timber floors and freestanding robes befitting the era of the home. The sitting room or study to the rear of the home is bright and airy, and looks out over the manicured gardens. Shedding won't be a problem, with a 4 bay machinery shed, an old chaff cutting shed (complete with original chaff cutter) adjoining another 2 bay machinery shed, a shearing shed (approx 21m x 8m) with holding pens which is now used as a family entertaining area, a small workshop shed and last but not least, a super cute shearers cottage which has been converted into a wonderful retreat or entertaining space with an open fire place.
Although the gardens are manicured to a parklike state at present, with very little work it would present as two large paddocks as well as a smaller paddock containing cattle yards and loading ramp.
Words don't do this property justice, so please book your inspection today to fully appreciate the charming character of this olde world beauty!

Description:
Fresh Young Home With Many Comforts
This amazingly beautiful family home is approx. 4 years old & offers all creature comforts including ducted heating & cooling; a luxurious kitchen with stainless steel 900mm appliances, breakfast bar with tonnes of storage room & benchspace. The open plan living area spills out to the east facing deck to enjoy the morning sunshine. Less than 1 minutes' drive will see you in town for the groceries, with Ballarat only 12 mins away, & Daylesford 25 mins for a day of pampering. Primary schools are walking distance & the high school bus is just one blocks' walk with Creswick offering many community groups & courses.

Description:
Gorgeous Cottage with Potential to Subdivide
Located within walking distance to all Creswick has to offer, this charming Victorian home presents many opportunities for the astute investor! Ideal as a first home, investment or for retirees wanting to downsize, this approximately 1000m2 allotment offers limitless options.
The quaint 2 bedroom home offers a large living room conveniently warmed by a split system, which leads into the well proportioned kitchen, where there is even enough room for a dining table! The cosy wood fired oven from yesteryear gives the cozy cottage feel, while a more modern oven and cooktop have been installed to make cooking a breeze. With no shortage of cupboard and bench space, you will be able to whip up even the most difficult of meals.
The family bathroom is light and bright, while the laundry is spacious with good storage.
The mudroom at the rear leads you out to the entertainment area; an enclosed, covered area with a built in fireplace for intimate family gatherings.
The back yard houses your vehicles with a combination of a double carport and a double lock up garage with concrete floor.
With the potential to subdivide STCA, your investment is solidly protected, with rear access to Pasco St where new houses are currently being built.
Call our agent today for an inspection.

Description:
Ultimate farm and vineyard package- Former Winery Clunes
The appeal and scope this property offers those seeking the ultimate tree change with its picturesque views of Mount Beckworth and the Great Dividing Range will entice one to explore further the opportunity on offer here.
Formerly the Mount Beckworth winery, this property is set on 32 cleared acres with approx. 10 acres planted with established cool climate vines, producing award winning wines, consisting of Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, Shiraz, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, ideal for a steady income whilst grazing of stock to supplement the lifestyle getaway.
With Clunes situated only 6 kms away, which has great infrastructure and amenities, this comfortable home offers 3 bedrooms with 2-way bathroom and large walk in robe to master with direct access to the large rear deck to take in the views off the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms while a central kitchen has access to the combined lounge and dining areas and separate family room with gas log heating.
Externally the shedding is superb with 3 bay machinery sheds, 20x40 each, with power and concrete floor and former cellar door with heating and cooling, ideal as rumpus or teenage getaway. A large substantial dam provides irrigation to vines and stock while ample tanks supply domestic water. Well situated to Ballarat and historic Clunes as well as other wineries, this property is well worth the viewing to take in the sights and breathe in your new wine getaway.
Call now to arrange your viewing
